allow: Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load(open(''data/episode_metadata.json'')); print(f''Total episodes in metadata: {len(data[""episodes""])}''); episodes = sorted(set((e[''season''], e[''episode'']) for e in data[''episodes''])); print(f''Unique episodes: {len(episodes)}''); print(''Episodes:'', episodes)")
